name: Duong Cao
about: A dedicated recruiter with more than 10 years of working in Finance, Banking, Auditing & Accounting professional firm.

experiences.description: Connect for impact | Deloitte BrandTalk | Deloitte Vietnam Careers

KPMG operates as a global network of independent member firms offering audit, tax and advisory services; working closely with clients, helping them to mitigate risks and grasp opportunities. KPMG member firms can be found in more than 152 countries. Collectively they employ more than 189,000 people across a range of disciplines.

In Vietnam, KPMG is one of the largest professional services firms, with over 1,000 staff working from our offices in Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi and recently in Da Nang. We work with our colleagues across Asia and around the world to provide professional service.

Since Day One
Since Day One
Our firm has a rich history of doing great work and making a difference, not only for our clients and our people, but for society at large. Watch this short video to learn about the key role our firm has played in important historic events.

ManpowerGroup is the world leader in innovative workforce solutions, connecting human potential to the power of business. ManpowerGroup serves both large and small organizations across all industry sectors through our brands and offerings: ManpowerGroup Solutions, Experis, Manpower and Right Management. 
Manpower Group was founded in the United States in 1948, and it now has operation offices in more than 80 countries worldwide.
Manpower Vietnam is a member of Manpower Group and we are proud to be always in the top of HR service providers in Vietnam, both permanent recruitment and staffing services.
